How would you approach a REST API with dozens of interconnecting
functionality? IMHO, It's doable in theory, but probably not in practice...
yet.  Am I right in that assessment?  If so, what do we need to do to get to
that point?  If so, what rule of thumb can be used to determine if REST (as
opposed to other distributed technologies) is appropriate for a particular
set of functionality features?
-Solomon
